citations.title: Arctic Sea Ice Prediction Based on Multi-Scale Graph Modeling With ...
Deep Graph Neural Networks for Spatiotemporal Forecasting of Sub-seasonal Arctic Sea Ice (preprint)
IceGCN: An Interactive Sea Ice Classification Pipeline for SAR (MDPI Remote Sensing)
Sea Ice Segmentation From SAR Data by Convolutional Neural Networks (arXiv)
OSI-SAF Medium Resolution Sea Ice Drift product (OSI-407-a)
Sea Ice Concentration: NOAA/NSIDC Climate Data Record
The Sea Ice Drift Forecast Experiment (SIDFEx)
Open-source sea ice drift algorithm for Sentinel-1 SAR imagery (The Cryosphere, 2017)
Graph Neural Networks for Emulation of Finite-Element Ice (ice sheets; arXiv)
Data-Driven Uncertainty-Aware Forecasting of Sea Ice Conditions in the Arctic (arXiv)
